verses.verse: Thou <S%H1121>also<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> thee a <S%H3843>tile<s%>, and <S%H5414>lay<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2710>thee<s%>, and portray upon it a <S%H5892>city<s%>, even <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>:

and <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H4692>siege<s%> against <S%H1129>it<s%>, and build <S%H1785>forts<s%> against <S%H8210>it<s%>, and cast up a <S%H5550>mound<s%> against <S%H5414>it<s%>; set <S%H4264>camps<s%> also against <S%H7760>it<s%>, and plant battering <S%H3733>rams<s%> against it round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And <S%H3947>take<s%> thou unto thee an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H4227>pan<s%>, and <S%H5414>set<s%> it for a <S%H7023>wall<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> between thee and the <S%H5892>city<s%>: and <S%H3559>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> toward <S%H4692>it<s%>, and it shall be besieged, and thou shalt lay <S%H6696>siege<s%> against <S%H226>it<s%>. This shall be a sign to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Moreover <S%H7901>lie<s%> thou upon thy <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%>, and <S%H7760>lay<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> upon <S%H4557>it<s%>; according to the number of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that thou shalt <S%H7901>lie<s%> upon <S%H5375>it<s%>, thou shalt bear their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

For I have <S%H5414>appointed<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to be unto thee a <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%>, even <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: so shalt thou <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H8145>again<s%>, when thou hast <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> <S%H428>these<s%>, thou shalt <S%H7901>lie<s%> on thy <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%>, and shalt <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, each <S%H3117>day<s%> for a <S%H8141>year<s%>, have I appointed it unto <S%H5414>thee<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3559>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H4692>siege<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, with thine <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H2834>uncovered<s%>; and thou shalt prophesy against <S%H5012>it<s%>.

And <S%H5414><s%>, behold, I lay <S%H5688>bands<s%> upon <S%H2015>thee<s%>, and thou shalt not turn thee from one <S%H6654>side<s%> to the <S%H6654>other<s%>, till thou hast <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H4692>siege<s%>.

Take <S%H3947><s%> thou also unto thee <S%H2406>wheat<s%>, and <S%H8184>barley<s%>, and <S%H6321>beans<s%>, and <S%H5742>lentils<s%>, and <S%H1764>millet<s%>, and <S%H3698>spelt<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> thee <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H4557>thereof<s%>; according to the number of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that thou shalt <S%H7901>lie<s%> upon thy <S%H6654>side<s%>, even <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, shalt thou eat <S%H398>thereof<s%>.

And thy <S%H3978>food<s%> which thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> shall be by <S%H4946>weight<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%>: from <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6256>time<s%> shalt thou eat <S%H398>it<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> by <S%H4884>measure<s%>, the sixth <S%H8345>part<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin<s%>: from <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6256>time<s%> shalt thou <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> it as <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H5692>cakes<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H5746>bake<s%> it in their <S%H5869>sight<s%> with <S%H1561>dung<s%> that cometh <S%H6627>out<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Even thus shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%>, among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> whither I will drive <S%H5080>them<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H162>I<s%>, Ah <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>! <S%H5315>behold<s%>, my soul hath not been <S%H2930>polluted<s%>; for from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> up even till now have I not <S%H398>eaten<s%> of that which dieth of <S%H5038>itself<s%>, or is <S%H2966>torn<s%> of <S%H935>beasts<s%>; neither came there <S%H6292>abominable<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> into my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>me<s%>, See, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> thee <S%H1241>cow<s%>'s <S%H6832>dung<s%> for <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H1561>dung<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H6213>prepare<s%> thy bread <S%H3899>thereon<s%>.

Moreover he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7665>behold<s%>, I will break the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%>, and with <S%H1674>fearfulness<s%>; and they shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> by <S%H4884>measure<s%>, and in <S%H8078>dismay<s%>:

that they may <S%H2637>want<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H8074>dismayed<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with <S%H251>another<s%>, and pine <S%H4743>away<s%> in their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.
